meanings.definition: A type of bird that catches insects in mid-air.
meanings.sent1: The flycatchers chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of flycatchers darting through the sky.
meanings.sent3: The flycatchers decided to have a race to see who could catch the most bugs.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements were like those of a flycatcher, capturing every opportunity that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The flycatchers' graceful flight mesmerized all who watched.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that catches flies.
meanings.sent1: The flycatchers in the kitchen were very effective at their job.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new flycatcher to help with the pesky insects.
meanings.sent3: The flycatchers at the picnic were the unsung heroes of the day.
meanings.sent4: She was a flycatcher, always quick to spot and eliminate any problems that arose.
meanings.sent5: The flycatcher's swiftness in catching flies amazed everyone around.
